[[Hobbiton]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1172}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death=after {{SR|1222}} | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Boffin Family|Boffin]] | parentage=[[Buffo Boffin]] and [[Ivy Goodenough]] | siblings=[[Bosco Boffin|Bosco]], [[Basso Boffin|Basso]] and [[Briffo Boffin|Briffo]] | spouse=[[Balbo Baggins]] | children=[[Mungo Baggins|Mungo]], [[Pansy Baggins|Pansy]], [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto]], [[Largo Baggins|Largo]] and [[Lily Baggins|Lily]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Berylla Baggins, n√©e Boffin''', was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Berylla married [[Balbo Baggins]]. Their children were [[Mungo Baggins|Mungo]], [[Pansy Baggins|Pansy]], [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto]], [[Largo Baggins|Largo]], and [[Lily Baggins|Lily]].{{App|Boffin}} Berylla's brother was [[Basso Boffin|Basso]], who is said to have "gone to [[Belegaer|sea]]" in {{SR|1195}} at the age of 26.{{App|Bolger|50}}, p. 1102 ==Etymology== Berylla is named after [[wikipedia:beryl|beryl]], a type of mineral which includes emerald and aquamarine.[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names" {{References}} [[Category:Baggins]] [[Category:Boffin]] [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Berylla Beutlin]] [[fi:Berylli Boffin]]
